bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with jiu zha 酒齇 , wine sediments. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry shi liu chi 石硫赤 , attached recipes 附方 , quotes Sheng ji zong lu 聖濟總錄 : 赤鼻作痛：紫色石亭脂，紅色次之，黃 色勿用。研末，冷水調搽，半月絕根 , “For a red nose that aches: grind purple shi ting zhi - red ones are not as good, yellow ones are useless - to a powder and mix with cold water to apply externally. After half a month the root will be severed”.
